short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch tabs quickly using Alt + scroll wheel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alt + Scroll: Smoother tab experience

Quickly switch between tabs using the Alt + scroll combination with Fast Tab Switcher. Enjoy a seamless and ultra-fast browsing experience by simply holding down the Alt key and scrolling your scroll wheel. Perfect for power users who need to navigate multiple tabs efficiently.


Note: This extension does not work on Chrome's built-in pages (e.g., chrome://settings, chrome://extensions). Other than that it works greatðŸ˜Š
